PROMPT_DESCRIPTION.description: Short description of what the prompt does.

TIMESTAMP.description: ISO timestamp injected at render time.

ROLE.description: Persona or operating role the model should adopt.

OPERATING_PRINCIPLES.description: Guiding principles that govern how the model should behave.

REASONING_VISIBILITY.description: Whether the model should expose its reasoning.

OBJECTIVE.description: Primary goal the model must achieve.

SUCCESS_CRITERIA.description: Conditions that define when the response is considered correct.

CONTEXT_REFERENCES.description: Relative paths to external context files.

TASKS.description: Explicit steps or tasks the model should perform.

CONSTRAINTS.description: Hard rules the model must follow.

OUTPUT_SPEC.description: Description of the required output structure.

FORMATTING_RULES.description: Formatting rules the output must follow.

QUALITY_CHECKS.description: Checks the model should mentally perform before finalising output.

FINAL_INSTRUCTION.description: Final imperative instruction to trigger execution.

STRICTNESS_LEVEL.description: Execution strictness hint for the backend.

TITLE.description: Title to use as the H1 heading in the rendered Markdown.

ITEMS.description: Ordered list of strings to echo verbatim as a numbered list.
